channel.title: Server listening on port... Help
channel.description: I'm trying to change the Ip address on the Pi base source that i recently downloaded, I've changed the "server =" in client.java and it still continues to say this. [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/i1w4lc.jpg[/img] i don't know what i'm doing wrong.. I've compiled and everything and still nothing will work.. Any tips?

item.title: Server listening on port... Help
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Try changing it to 127.0.0.1 and then compile thats what I do and it works for all my pi’s and basically any 317 I use are all 127.0.0.1 hope this helps

:Edit: if you changed it in Client.Java in the source folder try changing it in the Client.Java in the client folder as well And compile :Edit:

Read full topic
